attributes.action: exert pressure on the BBC so that it does not waste any more money covering the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should the British license payer have to pay towards this garbage anymore?
The competition is way beyond a joke now, even the camp, entertainment value has gone, and we are left with a bunch of mostly talentless eastern european countries, carving up the competition between them. 
It is now more embarassing to watch the voting patterns than the artists! (which used to be the only reason to watch it)
The BBC must be immediately stopped from spending our money on tripe like this.
